name: Space n Vaders
description:
Vision

Space ’n Vadersis a retro reimagined modern version of the classic 70s and 80s arcade shoot ’em ups brought to you by Team CHICHI.

Spiced up by a new player perspective from the rear and a stylish, Modern Retro look, the now 2.5D gameplay adds to the dynamic while being as simple as ever.

Identify yourself with our cute main character ChiChi, the flying squirrel, and hop on your mission to rescue the whole universe from evil space villains.

Key Facts

Genre: Arcade space shoot ’emup

Players: 1

Platform: PC (Windows 10)

Controls: Keyboard

Target audience: Retro &Casual gamers

Average Play Time: 5 to 15 min.

Art style: Modern Retro

Perspective: Rear

Engine: Unity
